DellPluginInventory.description: The DellPluginInventory schema describes the plugin inventory and the properties for the plugin service itself.
DellPluginInventory.longDescription: This resource shall represent a plugin inventory and the properties that affect the plugin service itself for a Redfish implementation.

Restart.description: The Restart operation shall restart plugin instance present in SoftwareInventory.
Restart.longDescription: The Restart operation shall restart plugin instance present in SoftwareInventory.

Uninstall.description: The Uninstall operation shall remove plugin instance present in SoftwareInventory.
Uninstall.longDescription: The Uninstall operation shall remove plugin instance present in SoftwareInventory.

title: #DellPluginInventory
